values.description: Short call calendar spread is a combination of a longer-term (far-leg/front-month) call and a shorter-term (near-leg/back-month) call.
values.keywords: Short Call calendar spread, call horizontal spread, profits from a decrease in the underlying price, profits from from an increase in the underlying price, profits from the time decay value, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, strategy payoff, risk of early assignment
